title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Investors can’t afford to ignore the stagflation threat shadowing the market
items.description: Don’t get caught napping by the potential for renewed inflation pressures as the economy slows, warns a top Wall Street economist.

items.title: It’s a new era of central bank dissent — and with a whiff of stagflation in the air, that’s not likely to change
items.description: It’s an era of unprecedented central bank dissension — and agreement is hard to find when the goals are in conflict.

items.title: Eli Lilly’s weight-loss pill didn’t work so well, and the stock is plunging
items.description: Lilly’s stock was tumbling as disappointing trial data for an oral weight-loss pill offset an upbeat earnings report and outlook.

items.title: Google’s new diffusion AI agent mimics human writing to improve enterprise research

items.title: How a ‘vibe working’ approach at Genspark tripled ARR growth and supported a barrage of new products and features in just weeks
items.description: AI-native working allows Genspark to work at “gen speed” and release new products and features nearly every week.

items.title: New ‘persona vectors’ from Anthropic let you decode and direct an LLM’s personality
